title: VU Magazine Display Font - Looks like Parisine, but I think it's other font...
content:
Can anyone help me identify this beautiful VU Magazine cover font? Looks like Parisine, but I think it's other font...

Beautiful swashes on the "U", "M" and "A" letters! Note also the inktrap on that "M"!

Does anyone know?

The link for the photo is this:  
 [http://www.lastfile.com/wp-content/uploads/2008/06/couv\_home.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014035027/http:/www.lastfile.com/wp-content/uploads/2008/06/couv_home.jpg "http://www.lastfile.com/wp-content/uploads/2008/06/couv\_home.jpg")

Thank you!
author: Matheus D.
